DOC.brief_summary: This national registry study determine genetic risk factor serial biomarkers thoracic aortic aneurysm/dissection
DOC.brief_title: A Registry Study Genetics Biomarkers Thoracic Aortic Aneurysm/Dissection
DOC.criteria: Case 1 . Subject diagnose thoracic aortic aneurysm/dissection CT angiography , interventional angiography vascular ultrasound ; 2 . Age le 80 year old ; 3. male non pregnancy female ; 4 . Subject understands study requirement aand agree sign informed consent form prior study procedure . Case Subject one following : 1 . Pseudoaneurysm ; 2 . Previous infection trauma damage part aorta ; 3 . Pregnancy female ; 4 . Participate clinical trial last 1 month . Control 1 . Age gender match case ; 2 . No aortic disease detect outpatient ultrasound ; 3 . No family history cardiovascular disease ; 4 . Normal biochemical indicator ; Criteria culling , shed suspension testing : 1 . Culling : Unqualified case control . Data cull subject use statistical analysis ; 2 . Shedding : Subject self withdrawal , loss followup , quitted doctor ; Reasons shed indicate shed subject . 3 . Suspension : ) The researcher find significant safety problem wrong study design ; b ) Researchers continue clinical research due funding management reason ; c ) Director end study . When suspension happen , CRF table reserve future reference .
